resources.string: Do it until you become it
There are no gurus in this world, just ordinary people who have done the same thing over 10,000 times
Winning is good, but it\'s not important. It\'s what you become in the process, the character that you build
It\'s time you stop doing it and start living it
Always hold your head up, NO MATTER WHAT
It\'s not about how you go down, but how you get beck up
You have to see it to become it
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
